title: 18 /24 seed phrase can't be imported

labels.name: priority 2: medium
labels.description: an issue that is not severely affecting the overall app, it may interfere with some users users expe

body:
# Bug Report

When filled up the 11th word, the next screen of words appears and it's impossible to enter the 12th word for the 18 or 24 words seed phrase.

## Steps to reproduce
1. Launch the app
2. Click 'I already use Status' - 'Enter a seed phrase'
3. Click on 18 or 24 words
4. Starting from the 1st-word field, enter a letter and select some word in the list
5. After the 11th word, try to enter the word in the 12th word's field

#### Expected behavior
The screen is the same and it's possible to enter the 12th word in the 12th word's field. Only after entering the 12th word, the 13th word's field is available and the screen changed.
#### Actual behavior
The screen is NOT the same and it's impossible to enter the 12th word in the 12th word's field because after entering the 11th word, the screen is scrolled to the 13th field. 

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14942081/161656537-f5ca95cd-97dd-460b-8f10-51205e37719e.mov
https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14942081/161656562-a903ad5e-eee8-41a5-9af3-3e9f700c56c2.mov

### Additional Information

- Status desktop version: master - commit 6d9c5c4286777669f4f0792f93d672fb7f231eec
- Operating System: macOS Big Sur, 11.6.5 (20G526)

```
qrc:/app/AppLayouts/Onboarding/stores/OnboardingStore.qml:14: ReferenceError: userProfile is not defined
qrc:/app/AppLayouts/Onboarding/stores/OnboardingStore.qml:11: ReferenceError: mainModule is not defined
qrc:/app/AppLayouts/Onboarding/views/KeysMainView.qml:40:9: QML Image: Cannot open: qrc:/imports/assets/png/keys.png
qrc:/app/AppLayouts/Onboarding/views/SeedPhraseInputView.qml:142: TypeError: Cannot read property 'textEdit' of null
Network Cache Dir:  "/Users/anastasiya/status-desktop/Status/tmp/netcache"
qrc:/app/AppLayouts/Onboarding/views/SeedPhraseInputView.qml:142: TypeError: Cannot read property 'textEdit' of null
qrc:/app/AppLayouts/Onboarding/views/SeedPhraseInputView.qml:95: TypeError: Cannot read property 'leftComponentText' of null
qrc:/app/AppLayouts/Onboarding/views/SeedPhraseInputView.qml:95: TypeError: Cannot read property 'leftComponentText' of null

qrc:/app/AppLayouts/Onboarding/views/SeedPhraseInputView.qml:99: ReferenceError: grid is not defined
qrc:/StatusQ/src/StatusQ/Controls/StatusSeedPhraseInput.qml:175: TypeError: Value is undefined and could not be converted to an object
qrc:/app/AppLayouts/Onboarding/views/SeedPhraseInputView.qml:142: TypeError: Cannot read property 'textEdit' of null
```

I changed the priority because now users can create only a 12-word seed phrase and use it for recovering the profile.
